p: Thirty dogs were included (Group 1: n=13, Group 2: n=8, Group 3: n=9). EOCD occurred in 2.0% of hemilaminectomies in the study period (2010‚Äê2017). Four causes of EOCD were identified: further extrusion of nucleus pulposus at original IVDE site (n=15), extrusion of an adjacent disc (n=6), haematoma at original surgical site (n=5) or extrusion of an unrelated disc (n=4).
